abstract: An International Monetary Fund employee has written an intriguing book that seems to borrow from the financial crisis — but was written before it.
snippet: An International Monetary Fund employee has written an intriguing book that seems to borrow from the financial crisis — but was written before it.
lead_paragraph: A mysterious hedge fund takes aim at weak currencies from Colombia to Ukraine. Finally, it succeeds in Turkey and a panic ensues as investors dump government debt, the currency dwindles and Ankara defaults on its obligations.

headline.main: Rex Ghosh and His Novel Set Bankers Abuzz
